import React from 'react'; import './hero.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Hero() { return ( <>


Who are we? We are ...

Here to help you

Learn all the secrets to maximizing the value of your sale price and reducing or eliminating your taxes when you sell your self-storage business.

üì¶

A community for self-stroage owners

You‚Äôve worked hard and we want to help you get what you deserve when you sell.

üè¢

A community by self-stroage owners

We are self-storage owners. Peers are often our best source of support and knowledge. Welcome. We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre here.

‚ú®

Expert advice, always free

We want to share knowledge, information, and tools to help you make the best decisions when selling your self-storage business. For free.

üí∞

100% free. Always

Seriously. We believe in abundance and relationships. We can make the pie bigger by sharing, not hoarding, information and knowledge. So we give away knowledge and expertise, for free. No catch. No gimmick. We‚Äôre not selling anything.

üìì

Learn best practices

Thankfully experience and wisdom are teachers that can be shared. Learn the best practices for how to approach selling your self-storage facility.

Benefits of The Self-Storage Owner‚Äôs Circle

We are self-storage owners. We want to help fellow owners increase their sale price and reduce taxes‚Äîthat's why we started this site. So you can easily learn everything we learned the hard way.
